name: Battle Trendaria
description:
It is the year 8000.

All animals have evolve the ability to transform into any other species.

6 species prove most popular.

2 factions battle for dominance.


Shapeshift and battle with your friends in this no frills 3rd person shooter.

Simple control scheme
Frenetic gameplay
Responsive action

  • 2 maps
  • 4 players
  • 6 characters
